document_title: Atopic dermatitis: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
To determine whether you have atopic dermatitis or not, your doctor will rely on the results of examining clinical signs on your skin and your medical history. You may also need to have some tests done to rule out other skin diseases.
If you suspect you are allergic to a certain food/irritant that causes skin irritation, tell your doctor.
subsection_title: viem da di ung.json. Diagnosis method of atopic dermatitis
